name: Chaos Bringer
description:
Play as a cosmic being that wants to return this world to primordial chaos, and fight with the one who wants to stop you.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, themed "Let there be chaos".

How to play: launch in fullscreen (for best experience); move with WASD/arrows.

Created by Zloy. and Benjamin Boswell, music from Another Metroid 2 Remake.
